welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Brighton! Known for its charming seaside atmosphere and friendly locals, we hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is used exclusively for private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Crystal Airport handles all shipping and freight services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
